dashboard.label: SPLing Bee Content
dashboard.definition:
{"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splbee_questions.csv | search Category="$category_token$" Number=$question_token$ | fields Number, Question, Answer, Hints| eval Hints=if("$hint_token$"="no"," ",Hints)| eval Answer=if("$answer_token$"="hide"," ",Answer)","enableSmartSources":true,"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@d","latest":"now"}},"name":"answer_hint"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splbee_questions.csv where Category IN ("Setup","Stocks","Food and Beverages","Firewall") | stats count by Category | sort Category"},"name":"category_input"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splbee_questions.csv | search Category="$category_token$" | stats count by Number
| sort + Number"},"name":"question_input"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee
| spath 
| search question=$question_token$ category="$category_token$"| timechart count | streamstats sum(count) as total | fields _time total","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"total_submissions"},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee 
| spath
| search question=$question_token$ category="$category_token$"| stats latest(results{}.answer) as User_Answer latest(realname) as Contestant latest(_time) as LatestSubmissionTime latest(custom.search) as LastestSubmittedSearch latest(runDuration) as Duration by username| convert ctime(LatestSubmissionTime) | eval Number=$question_token$ | join type=outer Number [|inputlookup splbee_questions.csv | search Number=$question_token$ Category=$category_token$ | fields Number Answer] | filldown Answer | eval Correct = if(User_Answer=Answer,1,0) | stats count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"unique_submissions"},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee 
| spath
| search question=$question_token$ category="$category_token$"| stats latest(results{}.answer) as User_Answer latest(realname) as Contestant latest(_time) as LatestSubmissionTime latest(custom.search) as LastestSubmittedSearch latest(runDuration) as Duration by username| convert ctime(LatestSubmissionTime) | eval Number=$question_token$ | join type=outer Number [|inputlookup splbee_questions.csv | search Number=$question_token$ Category=$category_token$ | fields Number Answer] | filldown Answer | eval Correct = if(User_Answer=Answer,1,0) | stats sum(Correct) as count","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"correct_answers"},"ds_search_7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee | spath
| search question=$question_token$ category="$category_token$"| stats latest(results{}.answer) as User_Answer latest(realname) as Contestant latest(_time) as LatestSubmissionTime latest(custom.search) as LastestSubmittedSearch latest(runDuration) as Duration by username| convert ctime(LatestSubmissionTime) | eval Number=$question_token$ | join type=outer Number [|inputlookup splbee_questions.csv | search Number=$question_token$ Category=$category_token$ | fields Number Answer] | filldown Answer | eval breakdown = if(User_Answer=Answer,"Correct","Incorrect") | stats count by breakdown","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"correct_breakdown"},"ds_search_8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee | spath
| search question=$question_token$ category="$category_token$"| stats latest(answer) as User_Answer latest(_time) as LatestSubmissionTime latest(search) as LastestSubmittedSearch latest(runDuration) as Duration dc(request.custom.search) as unique_searches by username category question|rename question as Number category as Category username as Contestant| convert ctime(LatestSubmissionTime)|lookup splbee_questions.csv Category Number OUTPUT Answer | filldown Answer | eval Correct = if(User_Answer=Answer,1,0) | table Contestant LatestSubmissionTime Correct unique_searches Duration| sort - Correct + LatestSubmissionTime | streamstats count as row | eval Points = if(Correct=1,101-row,0)|eval Bonus=case(unique_searches=1,25,unique_searches<=2,15,unique_searches<=3,5,1=1,0)|eval Total=Bonus+Points | fields - row unique_searches 
| table Contestant LatestSubmissionTime Correct Total Points Bonus Duration","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"subissions"},"ds_search_9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup spling_bee_start|eval current=0 | append [| makeresults | eval started_at=_time | eval category="$category_token$" | eval question="$question_token$"|eval current=1]|fields - _time | sort 0 - started_at | dedup category question | outputlookup spling_bee_start","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}},"name":"kvstore_inputs"}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Select Time Range:","options":{"token":"time_token","defaultValue":"@d,now"}},"input_2":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Select A Category","options":{"token":"category_token","defaultValue":"Setup"},"encoding":{"value":"primary.Category","label":"primary.Category"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"}},"input_3":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Select Question:","options":{"token":"question_token","defaultValue":"1"},"encoding":{"value":"primary.Number","label":"primary.Number"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"}},"input_4":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Show Hint?","options":{"token":"hint_token","defaultValue":"no","items":[{"value":"yes","label":"Yes"},{"value":"no","label":"No"}]}},"input_5":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Show Answer","options":{"token":"answer_token","defaultValue":"hide","items":[{"value":"show","label":"Show"},{"value":"hide","label":"Hide"}]}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1200},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_2","type":"block","position":{"x":590,"y":290,"w":500,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":280,"w":220,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":230,"y":280,"w":230,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":420,"w":210,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":220,"y":420,"w":240,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":460,"y":280,"w":710,"h":280}},{"item":"viz_markdown_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":480,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_markdown_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":80,"w":690,"h":200}},{"item":"viz_timer_1","type":"block","position":{"x":700,"y":0,"w":500,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_MP3Y1F7f","type":"block","position":{"x":1060,"y":0,"w":120,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_sPflhW9a","type":"block","position":{"x":1060,"y":80,"w":180,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_1","input_2","input_3","input_4","input_5"]},"description":"Dashboard Studio for Main Dashboard","title":"SPLing Bee majorValue | rangeValue(majorColorEditorConfig)","trendColor":"#0877a6"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"Total table | seriesByName("Correct") | rangeValue(CorrectRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)","data":"> table | seriesByName("Correct") | formatByType(CorrectColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | seriesByName('Correct') | pick(CorrectRowColorsEditorConfig)"},"Total":{"data":"> table | seriesByName("Total") | formatByType(TotalColumnFormatEditorConfig)","rowColors":"> table | rangeValue(TotalRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig)"}}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_8"},"context":{"alignment":["left"],"CorrectColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"CorrectRowColorsEditorConfig":["#3c444d"],"CorrectRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#D41F1F","to":1},{"value":"#118832","from":1}],"TotalColumnFormatEditorConfig":{"number":{"thousandSeparated":false,"unitPosition":"after"}},"TotalRowColorsEditorConfig":["#3c444d"],"TotalRowBackgroundColorsEditorConfig":[{"value":"#f99d1c","to":75},{"value":"#F05A22","from":75,"to":100},{"value":"#ED0080","from":100,"to":105},{"value":"#C2006B","from":105,"to":125},{"value":"#980AEC","from":125}]},"title":"Round $question_token$ Submissions"},"viz_markdown_1":{"options":{"markdown":"## Important Information:
